item.title: Zoe add a quote by Joseph Joubert
item.description: "The worst thing about new books is that they keep us from reading the old ones." -- Joseph Joubert

item.title: Zoe add a quote by Jhumpa Lahiri
item.description: "That's the thing about books. They let you travel without moving your feet." -- Jhumpa Lahiri

item.title: Zoe add a quote by Cornelia Funke
item.description: "Stories never really end...even if the books like to pretend they do. Stories always go on. They don't end on the last page, any more than they begin on the first page." -- Cornelia Funke

item.title: Zoe add a quote by Pat Conroy
item.description: "You get a little moody sometimes but I think that's because you like to read. People that like to read are always a little fucked up." -- Pat Conroy

item.title: Zoe add a quote by Alice Hoffman
item.description: "Books may well be the only true magic." -- Alice Hoffman

item.title: Zoe add a quote by Katherine Howe
item.description: "But remember. Just because you don't believe in something doesn't mean it isn't real." -- Katherine Howe

item.title: Zoe add a quote by Katherine Howe
item.description: "Of course mothers and daughters with strong personalities might see the world from very different points of view." -- Katherine Howe

item.title: Zoe add a quote by Amy Tan
item.description: "We dream to give ourselves hope. To stop dreaming - well, that’s like saying you can never change your fate." -- Amy Tan

item.title: Zoe add a quote by Gregory Maguire
item.description: "People who claim that they're evil are usually no worse than the rest of us... It's people who claim that they're good, or any way better than the rest of us, that you have to be wary of." -- Gregory Maguire

item.title: Zoe add a quote by Dave Eggers
item.description: "Books have a unique way of stopping time in a particular moment and saying: Let’s not forget this." -- Dave Eggers
